    • Method Detail

      • rebuild

        public static void rebuild()
        Rebuilds (and re-reads) the storage of colormaps. Outputs succesfully read colormap names to the command line.

      • getColormapNames

        public static String[] getColormapNames()
        Getter for the list of colormap names in the directory. Used to load these maps.
        Returns:
        the array containing all of the currently available colormap names.

      • getColor

        public static ColormapInterpreter.Color getColor(String colorMapName,
                                 ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions dim,
                                 float var)
        Function to return a color from the colormap with linear scaling between endpoints.
        Parameters:
        colorMapName - The name of the colormap to use
        dim - The dimensions in the dataset to pick a color value between.
        var - The value to use.
        Returns:
        The color.

      • getColor

        public static ColormapInterpreter.Color getColor(String colorMapName,
                                 ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions dim,
                                 float var,
                                 float fillValue)
        Function to return a color from the colormap with linear scaling between endpoints.
        Parameters:
        colorMapName - The name of the colormap to use
        dim - The dimensions in the dataset to pick a color value between.
        var - The value to use.
        fillValue - The 'fill value' of the dataset, where no actual data exists. this will become black.
        Returns:
        The color.

      • getSwingColor

        public static Color getSwingColor(String colorMapName,
                  ColormapInterpreter.Dimensions dim,
                  float var)
        Function to return a Swing Color from the colormap with linear scaling between endpoints.
        Parameters:
        colorMapName - The name of the colormap to use
        dim - The dimensions in the dataset to pick a color value between.
        var - The value to use.
        Returns:
        The color.

      • getLegendJComboBox

        public static JComboBox<SimpleImageIcon> getLegendJComboBox(Dimension preferredDimensions)
        Function that returns a combobox with all of the legends of the entire list of colormaps for selection.
        Parameters:
        preferredDimensions - The dimensions of the combobox to be returned.
        Returns:
        The combobox.

      • getIndexOfColormap

        public static int getIndexOfColormap(String colorMap)
        Getter for the index number of a specific colormap name (used by swing).
        Parameters:
        colorMap - The name of the colormap selected
        Returns:
        The index number.
